title: Saffron 46 (番紅花46)
intro: Located in Xinyi District with a view of Taipei 101. Offers authentic fine dining Indian cuisine with Halal-friendly options.

title: Miacucina (My Kitchen)
intro: A popular Italian vegetarian restaurant serving salads, pasta, and paninis. Great for families and health-conscious travelers.

title: Yang Shin Vegetarian (養心茶樓)
intro: The first vegetarian Dim Sum restaurant in Taipei. Experience traditional Hong Kong style cuisine without meat.

title: Really Good Seafood (Really Good 海鮮)
intro: Upscale seafood restaurant in Daan District. Famous for fresh ingredients and traditional Taiwanese cooking methods.

title: Halal Bismilla Restaurant
intro: A hidden gem near Taipower Building station serving authentic Thai and Muslim-friendly dishes.

title: Chun Shui Tang (春水堂)
intro: The birthplace of Pearl Milk Tea. Serves tea, snacks, and noodles. Many pork and chicken options available.
